rawText:
<T extends CsvItemType>(
  filePath: Path
): T[] | null => {
  // TODO: is this needed?
  if (!fs.existsSync(filePath)) return null;

  const readable = canReadSync(filePath);
  if (!readable) return null;
  const fileBuffer = fs.readFileSync(filePath);
  if (!fileBuffer) return null;

  const parsed = parse(fileBuffer, { columns: true }) as T[];

  // const parsed = tryParseCsv<T>(fileString);
  return parsed;
}
name: readCsvFileSync

simplifiedSchema.fullComment:
unlike PathLike, this is only a string

For now, we don't have a clear convention whether or not this string should be absolute or anything.

description:
Reads and parses CSV file

specify a generic of what type of item the file contains an array of
